message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for your needs.  Given its value and the benefits it offers, I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is significantly higher than what I had in mind.  Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to meet the $16,000 price point. Would you consider $13,000 for the product?

Bob, I appreciate your efforts in this negotiation, but $13,000 is cutting it too close to my bottom line.  How about we settle at $14,500? This is a very fair offer considering the value you'll gain from this product.
Hello Alice, I've done my best to meet you halfway, but unfortunately, I cannot go above $13,000. Could you possibly reconsider your offer?
